title: Fields of Glory (1993 dos game)
description:
Fields of Glory 1993 dos game

One of my all time personal favorites a true classic in the realtime wargaming genre. 


unzip & use dosbox to run game (http://www.dosbox.com/)



Fields of Glory is a real-time strategy video game published by MicroProse in 1993. In the game players can re-enact several famous battles in Napoleon's Waterloo campaign. The battles in the game are fought in real-time, and strive to create a sense of realism.
